og.title: Anthem excludes area hospitals in health care exchange

twitter.description: ROCHESTER — Two area hospitals, Frisbie Memorial Hospital and Portsmouth Regional Hospital, were named to a list of 10 throughout the state that will not be providing care to patients under the individual health insurance offered through the Affordable Care Act's exchanges, while just one area hospital, Wentworth-Douglass, was included in Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield's Pathway network.Additionally, York Hospital will not be in the Anthem network in Maine.Hospitals such as Wentworth-
